I feel good that a young team could respond this way. With Allen Iverson leading the way with 26 points, the Sixers built an 18-point lead by the 7:33 mark of the third quarter. UNTIL JAN 23, 3:00 p.m. BERKELEY- Treasurer Bill Lockyer said Saturday that if lawmakers fail to quickly adopt significant budget cuts, the state could be forced to begin issuing IOUs beginning in May. Depending on whether cuts are made soon, we may have to have IOUs go out in May, he said during a luncheon speech at a political seminar. Controller John Chiang, who would be responsible for making such a decision, has not publicly warned of that possibility. "I'm not supposed

ban underwriters from shifting the member fees to municipal-bond issuers. Both groups have political-action committees that finance candidate campaigns and employ lobbyists in Sacramento, California's capital, the Treasurer's office said. Apparently, it's a practice all over the country, Bill Lockyer said today in a telephone interview. "I don't think it's a good one."-- With assistance from Michael B. Marois in Sacramento, California. Editors: Pete Young , Mark Tannenbaum

Mike Pence says he won't run for presidency U.S. Rep. Mike Pence shut the door Thursday on a run for the presidency but left wide open the likelihood that he'll seek a different office: Governor of Indiana. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence , R-Columbus, said of himself and wife Karen in a letter being sent to supporters.
